string.name: desc
string.value:
This forest west of Minar is beautiful, but overrun with ferocious monsters.

Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
This forest in the east of Minar is ruled by Kentaurus King.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
The sun always sets in this forest, bathing it in beautiful red light.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Wyverns nest around this rocky gorge.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: name
string.value: Outside the West Entrance of Ariant

string.name: desc
string.value:
Cacti stand tall and strong around the gate, undaunted by the heat of the desert.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Lizards are race across the heated sand of the desert.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Bandits lie in wait for unsuspecting merchants coming to Ariant outside this gate.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
This pyramid, the tomb of an ancient Ariant king, is guarded by mummies.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
A small mound where Henesys's specialty mushrooms grow.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
This place is occupied by giant stone golems.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
A golden sand beach where the amazing blues of the ocean and sky meet on the horizon.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Below the forest, where the heinous Drake lurks in the shadow of the trees.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Every aspiring Master has to train here.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
This floating forest is inhabited by the impish peach-loving monkeys.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Tae Roon, suffering from improper qigong form, is hiding out in this bear territory.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
An herb garden where Mu Lung's specialty bellflower roots grow wild.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
The pirates anchored near Mu Lung have brought nothing but grief to the denizens.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Patrol Robots and Guard Robots are constantly roaming this brightly-lit street to promote safety.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Be careful, this perilous rocky mountain is susceptible to landslides.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
This deep mine produces the mysterious Rue Ore that fuels Edelstein.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Only personnel with high security clearance levels can enter this area.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Laboratory A is used by the Zenumists, the alchemists that pursue biological alchemy.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Laboratory A is used by the Alcadnos, the alchemists that pursue the combination of life and machinery.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
The Zenumists kept Laboratory B closed to the public.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
The Alcadnos filled their Laboratory B with their test subjects, machines that live and think on their own.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
This toy factory operates 24 hours a day to keep up with demand.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Inside the Clocktower, Lubridium's time remains in suspension.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
The unpopular or unstable toys end up in storage on the bottom floor.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
The seal that controls time suspension in Lubridium is on the bottom floor of the Clocktower.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Memories of wasted time float around this lane.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
This road is leads to feelings of sadness and regret about the unchangeable past.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Walking this road helps you forget unpleasant memories.

Clear Count: #jcount#
Fastest Time: #jmin# min #jsec# sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Located outside Kritias, this place is extremely #cdangerous#. Stay away if you value your life.
Available to enter 3 times a day.

string.value: Requires Spring of Rebirth.\n\rLimited to 3 entries per day.

string.name: desc
string.value: Horntail lives in this glowing cave.

string.name: desc
string.value: This cave is inhabited by the wise onyx dragon, Afrien.

string.name: desc
string.value: Somewhere in this desert is Master Thief Phantom's hideout.

string.name: desc
string.value: This pathway in Henesys would be a safe place to meet with Evan.

string.name: desc
string.value: Larelle is being kept hostage somewhere near here.

string.name: desc
string.value: Wu Gong and Tae Soo were abducted from this misty forest.

string.name: desc
string.value: This secretive spot will make a good place to meet with Wonny.

string.name: desc
string.value: Arsen appeared on this rocky road.
